welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Lake Wylie, a charming city known for its picturesque lake and friendly community. We invite you to explore our beautiful town and enjoy all it has to offer!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Charlotte Douglas Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A is a domestic terminal at Charlotte Douglas Airport, primarily used by American Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B is a domestic terminal at Charlotte Douglas Airport, primarily used by American Airlines and their regional partners.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C is a domestic terminal at Charlotte Douglas Airport, primarily used by American Airlines and their regional partners.

terminals.name: Concourse D
terminals.description: Concourse D is a domestic terminal at Charlotte Douglas Airport, primarily used by American Airlines and their regional partners.

terminals.name: Concourse E
terminals.description: Concourse E is an international terminal at Charlotte Douglas Airport, serving flights to Canada, Mexico, and the Caribbean.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rock Hill Airport houses the check-in counters, security checkpoints, and boarding gates for all flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Rock Hill Airport is reserved for private and charter flights, offering a more exclusive and personalized travel experience.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Concord-Padgett Regional Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Concord-Padgett Regional Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
